course_name: Professional Practice in Medical Nutrition Therapy 2
description: This course allows students to develop skill in professional practice in medical nutrition therapy. It follows from Professional Practice in Medical Nutrition Therapy 1, but increases its focus on complex cases, chronic disease management and more specialised areas within dietetics. Students will continue in placement throughout the semester, finally leading to the management of a full case load. The course will lead to the student being assessed for competence to practice as a Dietitian within the domain of nutrition care for individuals.
